name: sanitizer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also hand sanitizer) a liquid for washing your hands in order to get rid of harmful bacteria from them: Public health officials have urged people to slow the spread of flu by washing their hands frequently or using a hand sanitizer. He was constantly rubbing his hands with sanitizer because he had a lot of hands to shake.
Issarawat Tattong/Moment/GettyImages
a liquid or device for cleaning objects carefully in order to get rid of harmful bacteria from them: The mats are cleaned with bleach-based sanitizer. The toothbrush sanitizer is a high-tech toothbrush holder that bathes your toothbrush with ultraviolet light, which eliminates 99.9% of germs and bacteria.
More examplesFewer examplesAll visitors must use hand sanitizer before entering the ward.There's a big container of sanitizer on the wall. When soap and water are not available an alcohol-based sanitizer is a good alternative.
